Performer is a Feat in Baldur's Gate 3. Feats are special talents or expertises that provide special capabilities to characters. At certain levels, your character will get to choose between an Ability Score Improvement Feature or a Feat.

Performer Information

You gain Musical Instrument Proficiency, and your Charisma increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

How to unlock Performer

You'll need to fulfill the following requirements to unlock Performer

All Classes at Level 4
